page.title: 04SENIOR CITIZENS IN PUDSEY
page.content: {POPULATION }There has been an increase in the area since the recent building of sheltered housing on New Street. {HOUSING }New specially-designed developments have been built in the area-24 flats,55 bungalows and 19 alms houses.On ground level,they are fitted with ramps to assist people in wheel- chairs or using walking frames or sticks.They are situated in quiet areas,yet near to shops and bus- routes.{ {CARE OF THE ELDERLY} Home help services visit the elderly who cannot manage all their own work.They visit the severely incapable daily.The more able have weekly help.In sheltered housing wardens are on 24 hour call to assist anyone in difficulty.One local hairdresser offers cheap rates for senior citizens every Wednesday.
